item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Evelyn Waugh
item.description: "It doesn't matter what people call you unless they call you pigeon pie and eat you up." -- Evelyn Waugh

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Anchee Min
item.description: "The sun doesn't just hang on one family's tree" -- Anchee Min

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Gilles Deleuze
item.description: "A concept is a brick. It can be used to build a courthouse of reason. Or it can be thrown through the window." -- Gilles Deleuze

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Gloria Naylor
item.description: "The music in his laughter had a way of rounding off the missing notes in her soul." -- Gloria Naylor

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by John Guare
item.description: "It's amazing how a little tomorrow can make up for a whole lot of yesterday." -- John Guare

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Steve Wozniak
item.description: "If you love what you do and are willing to do what it takes, it's within your reach. And it'll be worth every minute you spend alone at night, thinking and thinking about what it is you want to design or build. It'll be worth it, I promise." -- Steve Wozniak

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Rob Reiner
item.description: "Everybody talks about wanting to change things and help and fix, but ultimately all you can do is fix yourself. And that's a lot. Because if you can fix yourself, it has a ripple effect." -- Rob Reiner

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Nellie Bly
item.description: "Energy rightly applied and directed will accomplish anything." -- Nellie Bly

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Alexander Pope
item.description: "Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul." -- Alexander Pope

item.title: Kitten2629 add a quote by Aung San Suu Kyi
item.description: "The only real prison is fear, and the only real freedom is freedom from fear" -- Aung San Suu Kyi
